attributes.action: Foreign Aid-Support the cessation and my Petition at the Scottish Parliament-Common Sense should prevail as we cannot afford this
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government has increased foreign aid by some £5.4 Billion or 77% to £12.4 Billion in a period of austerity cuts.
I have written to the current Prime Minister and his predecessor; his Deputy and his predecessor; the International Development Secretary, and predecessor (Douglas Alexander), inviting them to the ares, which is one of the local unemployment blackspot’s .This area was selected as an example of similar locations throughout the country. None of these accepted the invitation nor had the courtesy to respond, but the drivers of this petition will be readily demonstrated and evidenced,
